name: Ninjump (itch) (DryCarrot)
description:
So you need to run between to things i called colums. It is infinity runner about ninja xd. Game made on python so your antivirus can say it virus. If you do not trust me, i uploaded sours code xd. 

Started developing 9 August, 2021 year. 

So it is 3 enemys in game.

Birds.

  they are mostly won't damge you but they can hit you be carefull!!!

Hut.

the most undefitble enemy in game. 

Ninje.

He wanna kill you. But you too. You can smash it if you will run on high speed (Use powerups!).

Some gif:

(yep it veri small xd)

Oh ye and Controls.

LMB or SPACE - switch side

Down and Up arrow select menu paragraph.

Enter :  Use menu paragraph

(THe gaem very hard xdxdxdxdxd)
